name: Miami Dice
description:
Lore 

Dicehead is a dice tired from being thrown around during matches of the Miami Dice boardgame. The miniatures have taken everything from him. He will take it no longer. 

This friday night Dicehead will make sure these miniatures will meet their demise.

PREPARE TO DICE!


Gameplay 

Dicehead starts with a random gun that can only be reloaded when there is no bullet left. To reload the gun, Dicehead must roll, while his head spins a random gun will be selected. Dicehead must survive the wave of minitures as long as he can.


Controls  MoveWASDShootLeft mouse buttonRollSpaceReload and Randomize gunSpace (when magazine is empty)
